prompts.prompt: You are the scientific project manager of the project proposal below. Provide several keywords from the proposal. Search only in the sections 1 'Context' and section 2 'Detailed project description'. Formulate your response as a bulleted list:
You are the scientific project manager of the project proposal below. Write a short description as a paragrah of the scientific project proposal:
You are the scientific project manager of the project proposal below. What are the problem statements in the scientific project proposal? Formulate your response as a bulleted list:
You are the scientific project manager of the project proposal below. What are the scientific goals in the scientific project proposal? Formulate your response as a bulleted list:
You are the scientific project manager of the project proposal below. What are the proposed methods? Formulate your response as a bulleted list:
